item.title: [HIVE-20212] Hiveserver2 in http mode emitting metric default.General.open_connections incorrectly
item.summary: Hiveserver2 in http mode emitting metric default.General.open_connections incorrectly

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
